text:
The three characters CR-CR-LF are not regarded as a single EOL. In Release 
1.4.1 it was possible to replace this characters with a single end of line, but 
the first character of the new line was eaten up. This problem should be 
solved, but now it's not possible to replace cr-cr-lf with a single eof.
creator: thorsten_loeber@hp.com

text:
I have added explicit testcases for this sequence to CVS HEAD now - could you
please run them and tell me which one fails for you?  All of them pass for me.

What are these tests doing differently from your setup?
creator: bodewig@apache.org
